mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.kechnegkaoqin_uuid_number as kechnegkaoqinUuidNumber ,a.xuesheng_id as xueshengId ,a.kechnegkaoqin_id as kechnegkaoqinId ,a.kaoqinqingjia_text as kaoqinqingjiaText ,a.kaoqinqingjia_types as kaoqinqingjiaTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,xuesheng.xuesheng_name as xueshengName ,xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number as xueshengIdNumber ,xuesheng.xuesheng_phone as xueshengPhone ,xuesheng.xuesheng_photo as xueshengPhoto ,xuesheng.banji_types as banjiTypes
FROM kaoqinqingjia a left JOIN xuesheng xuesheng ON a.xuesheng_id = xuesheng.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.kechnegkaoqin_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kechnegkaoqinUuidNumber},'%')
and a.xuesheng_id = #{params.xueshengId}
and a.kaoqinqingjia_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.kaoqinqingjiaText},'%')
and a.kaoqinqingjia_types = #{params.kaoqinqingjiaTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and xuesheng.xuesheng_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengName},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengIdNumber},'%')
and xuesheng.xuesheng_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.xueshengPhone},'%')
and xuesheng.banji_types = #{params.banjiTypes}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
